name: redbracket-autocad-plugin
description: RedBracket AutoCAD Plugin for CADMATE 2025 Integration

scripts.dev: echo 'This is a C# AutoCAD plugin project. Use Visual Studio or run npm run build to compile the plugin.' && echo 'Built files will be in AutocadPlugIn/bin/x64/Release/' && npm run build:debug
scripts.install: echo 'No Node.js dependencies to install for this C# project.'

author: RedBracket
